text: Poseidon is a 2006 American disaster movie directed by Wolfgang Petersen. It is a remake of The Poseidon Adventure. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. It stars Josh Lucas, Kurt Russell and Richard Dreyfuss. It was released on May 12, 2006. ==Other websites == * * * Category:2006 movies Category:2000s disaster movies Category:2000s movie remakes Category:American action movies Category:American disaster movies Category:American movie remakes Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Wolfgang Petersen Category:Survival movies Category:Movies set on ships Category:Movies about tsunamis
title: Poseidon (movie)
